summary: The Block would like to cordially invite you to our first-ever meetup. We're holding it at Betahaus in Barcelona, an amazing co-working space on Feb. 25
title: Let's meet in Barcelona in two weeks
content: The Block would like to cordially invite you to our first-ever meetup. We're holding it at Betahaus in Barcelona, an amazing co-working space on Feb. 25 at 7 p.m. The event will be part networking, part opportunity to chat about your startup with the media, and a quick and dirty pitch-off with 10 crypto, AI, fintech, or ML startups.
We'll also have some beer and food, so come thirsty.
The pitch-off winners will be given a podcast interview on The Block and a table at our upcoming event in New York, with more details to come.
In short, I want to meet you all. I've spent most of my career traveling to new places and meeting cool startups and this opportunity is no different. You can RSVP here and apply to pitch below.
Special thanks to Betahaus for helping us with the event! Please check them out if you're looking for co-working space in Barcelona.
